Package controllers

Class DoctorController

java.lang.Object
controllers.DoctorController
public class DoctorController extends Object
Controller class for handling operations related to doctors. This class manages doctor functionalities such as viewing schedules, managing appointments, updating medical records, and recording appointment outcomes.
